ComicInfo.Summary: The "Best comic of 2011" as voted by: Wizard World, Pop Culture Addict, Comic Buzz, Talking Comics, and Geekadelphia continues! A powered up Francis has kidnapped a helpless Mary. Now Eddie and the Hero must join forces to stop the unstoppable. Will they find a way to defeat the Francis or will they both fall to the power mad villain bent on getting his revenge against the man who destroyed his life? Set in a world where the super heroes aren't really heroes at all...how far would you go to FLY? From the writer of the Wonderland Trilogy, Irresistible, and The Waking, Fly is sure to stay on your pull list! Featuring over 29 pages of content for the mind blowing conclusion and final issue to the new FALL story arc!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 15:11:01. [CVDB390962]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Eric Johnson, Jonathan Lam, Stephen Schaffer
ComicInfo.Editor: Hannah Gorfinkel Elder, Ralph Tedesco, Raven Gregory
ComicInfo.Characters: Eddie Patron, Francis Keiser, Mary Santinelle
